long_description: The women's REI Sport pants keep up with your fast-paced lifestyle thanks to a great fit and performance fabric. Active fit with 4-way stretch is great for cool-weather outdoor training, trail running and hiking, as well as indoor pursuits. Polyester and spandex fabric wicks moisture and helps protect skin from harmful UV light with a UPF 50+ rating. Breathable elastic waistband offers an extremely comfortable fit. Small drop-in pocket stores accessories on left hip, away from core training or stretching should you need to lay on your back. You'll go farther without discomfort thanks to flat seams which are placed to work with your stride. Front and rear princess seams offer a feminine look. Reflective details on the women's REI Sport pants increase visibility in dim light.
short_description: The women's REI Sport pants keep up with your fast-paced lifestyle thanks to a great fit and performance fabric.
